poem:
### Young Echoes

In the hushed halls of youth,  
where dust swirls in the breath of disbelief,  
a drummer beats against silence,  
echoing through dreams unhatched.  
Hands guide the young, unlearned—  
the rhythm of a future,  
waiting to be charted  
on the sheet music of their lives.  
Here, the pulse of creation quickens.
